item.title: Chicago R User Group... It's for the sexy people!
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_673” align=“alignleft” width=“169” caption=“Morris Day, y’all! “][/caption] I think we all know that Morris Day was talking about when he wrote the lyrics to “The Bird”: Yes! Hold on now, this dance ain't for everybody. Just the sexy people. White folks, you're much too tight. You gotta shake your head like the black folks. You might get some tonight. Look out! That’s right, he was talking about the new R User Group in Chicago!
